about.description: I am a certified professional in Computational Programming with several years of experience in web development. My passion for new technologies, particularly within the JavaScript ecosystem, has allowed me to stay at the forefront and provide innovative and efficient solutions. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge through studies in Computer Engineering with a focus on cybersecurity. My approach is centered on applying best development practices to ensure the code is efficient, maintainable, and free of errors.

experience.current-job-description: Manage complete developments, plan tasks and objectives to ensure that delivery times and expected results are met. Maintain organized documentation on project analysis and progress.
experience.first-job-description: Manage complete developments, plan tasks and objectives to ensure that delivery times and expected results are met. Maintain organized documentation on project analysis and progress.
experience.second-job-description: Effectively tackled complex problems. Implementation and update of application modules under the direction of senior software developers. I worked successfully both independently and in a team. Performed automated testing tasks and built add-on features on a routine basis.
experience.thrid-job-description: Productive collaboration with team to understand business requirements and specifications around product stewardship.
